artist: Engraver: Richard Earlom; Draftsman: after Claude de Lorraine; Publisher: Hurst, Robinson & Co.
creditline:

Gift of Herschel V. Jones, 1916
inscription: LL, on image, lettered: Claud [sic] | LL, in margin below image, lettered: Claude Lorraine delt. / No 98 | BC, in margin below image, lettered: Pub. May 2, 1817. by Boydell & Co. title: Landscape with Shepherds
